title: Important iOS notice
name: iOS Warning
excerpt: A critical iOS update impacting guest accounts will happen on January 21st. Make sure to read how to save your progress!

title: Update 12-2020
name: End of 2020
excerpt: The year is almost over, but Stormbound is not! Balance changes, new offers and some UI updates are around the corner!

title: Update 12-2020
name: Advent Event
excerpt: Christmas is around the corner and Sheepyard is releasing a small Advent Calendar patch, including some balance changes and exclusive offers.

title: Update 11-2020
name: Halloween Event
excerpt: It’s spooky season and Sheepyard releases a small Halloween event with balance changes, exclusive offers and cheapened Brawl.

title: Update 10-2020
name: Second Sheepyard Update
excerpt: The second Sheepyard update is ready and brings a new bundle of goodness to the game: balance, new cards, new friendly matches settings.

title: Event Anniversary
name: 3rd Anniversary Event
excerpt: A minor promotional update to celebrate Stormbound’s 3rd anniversary with offers (for paying and non-paying players) and gifts.

title: Update 09-2020
name: Small Buff Patch
excerpt: A minor balance patch buffing 12 under-appreciated cards: 9 neutral cards, 2 Ironclad cards and 1 Winter card. Nothing for Shadowfen and Swarm.

name: First Sheepyard Update
title: Update 07-2020
excerpt: The first update from Sheepyard featuring a new card, some balance tweaks, matchmaking improvements, economy updates, and more.
